nodes.bodyText: I do not see APIML_ENABLE_SSO environment variable on zowe-install-packaging repo master branch. Is it in another branch that is required to merge first?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -41,4 +41,20 @@ iconv -f IBM-1047 -t IBM-850 ${STATIC_DEF_CONFIG_DIR}/zosmf.ebcidic.yml > $STATI
 rm ${STATIC_DEF_CONFIG_DIR}/zosmf.ebcidic.yml
 chmod 770 $STATIC_DEF_CONFIG_DIR/zosmf.yml
 
-#TODO - if zaf is running add the api-catalog iframe plugin
+if [[ $LAUNCH_COMPONENT_GROUPS == *"DESKTOP"* ]]; then
+  if [[ $APIML_ENABLE_SSO == "true" ]]; then

nodes.bodyText: Hey Chris, thanks for checking. Master is way out of date now - that environment variable is from the staging branch (see https://github.com/zowe/zowe-install-packaging/blob/staging/scripts/instance.template.env)
nodes.diffHunk:
